originalText.text: Vanessa…..my visit to Manhattan was more than worth it because of you! Thank you! Enjoying all my new pieces! See you again soon.

text.text: Vanessa…..my visit to Manhattan was more than worth it because of you! Thank you! Enjoying all my new pieces! See you again soon.

originalText.text: Robert knew everything about the brand! He was so kind, helpful and knowledgeable. He was easy to talk to and so personable too. I have been a big fan of this brand for years and I'm really happy they have such a good presence in NYC through Robert.

text.text: Robert knew everything about the brand! He was so kind, helpful and knowledgeable. He was easy to talk to and so personable too. I have been a big fan of this brand for years and I'm really happy they have such a good presence in NYC through Robert.

originalText.text: I’m so happy to find out that Uno de 50 one of my favorite jewelry brands now is available at Macy’s Herald Square .  Robert is amazing  !!!He has experience and knowledge about the brand and newest collection . On top of that he provides a professional service. Uno de50 is so unique and exclusive if you go to Macy’s you must stop at this fabulous counter !

originalText.text: Uno de 50 is one of my favorite stores after my visit to New York on my trip 3 years ago and I bought hamsa necklace from them and since then I am in love with this brand and specially Robert who helped me with my purchase. It was such an amazing experience with him didn’t felt like I was in the store first time.He’s amazing and the best. I live in Massachusetts I will only buy it from Robert and get his advise on everything❤️❤️❤️. If you are in Macy herald square and love jewelry do stop at UNOde50 you will not regret it.

originalText.text:
Where to start??
It is many things that I would love to write about Uno de 50, but I would occupy pages and pages, that’s why I would do my best trying to say it in a concisely manner.
First, it is a wonderful experience to be welcome to the counter of this beautiful brand at Macy’s, by the people that work there, starting with my fabulous friend Robert.
He is  very knowledgeable of every detail of all the collections in existing. I enjoy listening to him about how every piece has a creation’ s meaning which is super interesting to me that when you carry on yourself  a necklace, a ring, a bracelet..... you know exactly the history of what you have. His vision of mixing and matching different pieces is exceptionally good. I can’t say enough things about him that describe how well he make you feel when you are getting any piece from Uno de 50.
Adele, is as well, a great person to help you at anytime at this location. Excellent manners and sweet person that make you enjoy your experience of shopping.

Now, the  brand itself has a unique style, beautiful and edgy. I love every piece I got!!! And always get compliments from friends when I’m wearing them!! Literally I would have a personal store in my own closet.
I can’t visit Macy’s without getting something from Uno de 50 !!! I feel  very satisfied with the quality of this jewelry brand!!!
Congratulations for making such a great products!!!
